scene_01.speaker: kiupita
scene_01.text: I thought we were becoming closer, but...

scene_02.speaker: kiupita
scene_02.text: It feels like every time I try to get closer, you push me away.

scene_03.speaker: kiupita
scene_03.text: I can't keep doing this. My heart can't take it anymore.

scene_04.speaker: kiupita
scene_04.text: I'm sorry, but I need to focus on myself. I hope you understand.

scene_05.text: Kiupita starts avoiding you. The friendship you built begins to crumble.

final.text: BAD ENDING - You had a chance at something special, but failed to nurture it. The relationship withered away.
